entry.title: Where early US coronavirus hotspots stand now

media:group.media:title: Where early US coronavirus hotspots stand now
media:group.media:description: CNN's John King looks at coronavirus trends across the US and shows how early hotspots of the virus are faring now. #CNN #News

entry.title: Dr. Fauci: Second wave isn't inevitable if we do this

media:group.media:title: Dr. Fauci: Second wave isn't inevitable if we do this
media:group.media:description: Dr. Anthony Fauci says that a second wave of Covid-19 infections isn't necessarily inevitable so long as Americans follow Centers for Disease Control guidelines. #CNN #News

entry.title: Trump threatens to shut down social media platforms

media:group.media:title: Trump threatens to shut down social media platforms
media:group.media:description: While Twitter has fact-checked President Trump’s false claims on mail-in ballots, they have not taken down the President’s tweets in which he makes false accusations about MSNBC host Joe Scarborough. CNN’s Donie O’Sullivan reports. #CNN #News

entry.title: Protests erupt over national anthem bill

media:group.media:title: Protests erupt over national anthem bill
media:group.media:description: Protesters take to the streets in Hong Kong over a controversial new security law and national anthem bill from China. CNN’s Anna Coren reports. #CNN #News

entry.title: Family of black man who died in police custody demands justice

media:group.media:title: Family of black man who died in police custody demands justice
media:group.media:description: The family of George Floyd, a black man who was held down with a knee as he protested that he couldn't breathe and later died in police custody, speaks with CNN's Don Lemon. #CNN #News

entry.title: Imagine giving up your child. This mother is considering it

media:group.media:title: Imagine giving up your child. This mother is considering it
media:group.media:description: Thousands of migrant domestic workers are stranded in Lebanon now jobless, penniless and some homeless with no way out as coronavirus exacerbates the country's economic crisis. CNN's Jomana Karadsheh reports. #CNN #News

entry.title: She called police on him in Central Park. Hear his response

media:group.media:title: She called police on him in Central Park. Hear his response
media:group.media:description: Christian Cooper speaks with CNN's Don Lemon about the encounter he had with a white woman who called the police on him during an encounter involving her unleashed dog in Central Park. #CNN #News

entry.title: Joe Biden says this is what he'd do if he were president during pandemic

media:group.media:title: Joe Biden says this is what he'd do if he were president during pandemic
media:group.media:description: Democratic presidential candidate Joe Biden speaks with CNN Chief Political Correspondent Dana Bash about the coronavirus pandemic, the 2020 election, and his potential running mate. #CNN #News

entry.title: 'What a little man,' Anderson Cooper reacts to Trump's conspiracy

media:group.media:title: 'What a little man,' Anderson Cooper reacts to Trump's conspiracy
media:group.media:description: CNN's Anderson Cooper excoriates President Donald Trump and calls him a "little man" for spreading falsehoods about a deceased woman. #CNN #News

entry.title: 4 cops fired after video shows one kneeling on neck of black man who later died

media:group.media:title: 4 cops fired after video shows one kneeling on neck of black man who later died
media:group.media:description: A video shared on social media appears to show a man, who family attorney Ben Crump has identified as George Floyd, on the ground, with an officer from Minneapolis Police Department placing his knee behind his neck forcing Floyd's face into the ground. Four Minneapolis police officers have been fired for their involvement, according to officials. #CNN #News

entry.title: White woman apologizes for calling the cops on black man

media:group.media:title: White woman apologizes for calling the cops on black man
media:group.media:description: Video shows Amy Cooper, a white woman, call police on Christian Cooper, a black man, after he asked her to put her dog on a leash in Central Park. #CNN #News

entry.title: Trump pushes conspiracy theory about MSNBC host

media:group.media:title: Trump pushes conspiracy theory about MSNBC host
media:group.media:description: Tweets from President Donald Trump have dredged up a baseless and debunked claim about MSNBC's Joe Scarborough. CNN's Donie O'Sullivan and Brian Stelter discuss the decades-old conspiracy theory. #CNN #News #politics #presidentdonaldtrump #usnews #happeningnow

entry.title: Lemon slams Trump's attacks on Biden and Marine vet congressman

media:group.media:title: Lemon slams Trump's attacks on Biden and Marine vet congressman
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Don Lemon says President Donald Trump is taking the low road by spreading lies about Rep. Conor Lamb (D-PA), MSNBC host Joe Scarborough and retweeting insults aimed at Stacey Abrams and Joe Biden.
#Trump #CNN #News

media:group.media:title: How coronavirus changed Congress
media:group.media:description:
Since the coronavirus pandemic hit the United States, Congress has seen a jump in its approval ratings. Chris Cillizza explains why this is the perfect example of why people don't like the government until they need them.
SOURCES AND FURTHER READING: Congress Job Approval Highest Since 2009 https://news.gallup.com/poll/311129/congress-job-approval-highest-2009.aspx
House passes coronavirus relief bill after Trump announces his support https://www.cnn.com/2020/03/13/politics/coronavirus-relief-congress/index.html Trump signs coronavirus relief legislation into law https://www.cnn.com/2020/03/18/politics/coronavirus-congress-relief-senate-house/index.html
Health Institutions Still Rated Best for COVID-19 Response https://news.gallup.com/poll/309614/health-institutions-rated-best-covid-response.aspx
Congress Job Approval Highest Since 2009 https://news.gallup.com/poll/311129/congress-job-approval-highest-2009.aspx
Clinton says era of big government is 'over' in 1996 State of the Union https://www.washingtonpost.com/video/politics/clinton-says-era-of-big-government-is-over-in-1996-state-of-the-union/2014/01/22/da7c0cb4-83b6-11e3-8099-9181471f7aaf_video.html
Republicans pump brakes on new coronavirus stimulus spending https://www.cnn.com/2020/05/19/politics/coronavirus-stimulus-congress/index.html
House approves $3 trillion Covid aid bill and historic rules change to allow remote voting https://www.cnn.com/2020/05/15/politics/house-vote-covid-aid-3-trillion-remote-voting/index.html
Americans' Trust in Mass Media Edges Down to 41% https://news.gallup.com/poll/267047/americans-trust-mass-media-edges-down.aspx
Poll finds Americans disapprove of media’s handling of coronavirus. But its the same polarized picture as ever https://www.washingtonpost.com/media/2020/03/27/poll-finds-americans-disapprove-medias-handling-coronavirus-its-same-polarized-picture-ever/
About me: I was named "best dressed" in 7th grade. That, along with being CNN's editor at large and author of the daily "Point" newsletter are my proudest achievements. Look for me here every Tuesday and Thursday to find out what’s really going down in politics.
CREDITS Writer: Chris Cillizza The Point team: Leigh Munsil and Allison Gordon Editor: Michelle Cho Producer: Arielle Sacks
Follow Chris on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cillizzac/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/cillizzacnn Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/chris.cillizza/ Subscribe to The Point newsletter: https://mailchi.mp/cnn/dvgb325pfm
#CNN #Cillizza #Congress

entry.title: Stanley Ho, Macao's 'godfather of gambling,' dies at 98

media:group.media:title: Stanley Ho, Macao's 'godfather of gambling,' dies at 98
media:group.media:description: Stanley Ho, a billionaire businessman who made his fortune in Macao's gambling industry, has died aged 98 in Hong Kong according to his family. CNN's Kristie Lu Stout reports. #CNNi #CNN #News
